content.body: we have an AO called IsIntegralNumber. in the spirit of "IsPropertyKey" -> "is a property key", we should maybe replace its uses with "is an integral Number"? we already use the latter form in some places.

also our definition of "integral number" is "When the term integral Number is used in this specification, it refers to a Number value whose mathematical value is in the set of integers." which strictly speaking is ill-defined because not all Number values have mathematical values. should probably be "refers to a _finite_ Number value [...]"
content.formatted_body: also our definition of "integral number" is "When the term integral Number is used in this specification, it refers to a Number value whose mathematical value is in the set of integers." which strictly speaking is ill-defined because not all Number values have mathematical values. should probably be "refers to a finite Number value [...]"

content.body: (Heh, I had "IsIntegralNumber" -> "is an integral Number" on my todo list.)
